name: Falcon Aviation and Pilots School
about: Falcon Aviation Academy is dedicated to providing high-quality, modern, and affordable flight training, aligning with global standards. Founded with the objective of contributing skilled pilots to the aviation industry, the academy emphasizes a comprehensive approach to pilot training. This includes thorough ground instruction and simulator-based learning using state-of-the-art Redbird MCX full-motion simulators, which reduce training costs and duration. Actual flight training focuses on executing maneuvers successfully, with a strong emphasis on theoretical studies and simulator practice. Led by Managing Director Harsh Vardhan Pratap Singh, a seasoned pilot with licenses from India, the USA, and Canada, Falcon Aviation Academy is committed to producing well-rounded and competent pilots. The academy's rigorous training programs ensure students are well-prepared for their careers in aviation.
